posts.text: Pure pace from the #71 Aston Martin of Robin Liddell, setting the fastest lap of the race at 1:55.836! Absolutely flying today. 🚀🔥 #IMSA #AstonMartin #RacePace

Metronome Award! ⏱️🎯 Tyler Gonzalez in the #99 Hyundai showed incredible consistency, with only a 0.025s lap time std dev over 5 laps. Precision driving at its finest! #IMSA #Consistency #Hyundai #RaceData

Untapped potential? 📈🤯 The #98 Hyundai of Harry Gottsacker could have been 0.735s faster! His optimal lap (1:57.473) was significantly quicker than his best. Room to grow! #IMSA #UntappedPotential #DataDriven
Pit stop prowess! ⚙️💨 The #2 Porsche from CSM delivered the most efficient pit cycle, with an average loss of just 44.588s! Crucial gains made in the box. #IMSA #PitStop #RaceStrategy #Porsche
Unbelievable teamwork in the #13 Ford! 🤝🔥 Jenson Altzman & Chad McCumbee had a microscopic 0.014s lap time delta between them. Perfect synergy! #IMSA #Teamwork #Ford #DriverDeltas
Tire wear woes hit the #56 Audi hard! 📉 End-of-stint degradation rate of 20.976s/lap tells a tough story. Battling the fall-off all race. #IMSA #TireDeg #RaceAnalytics #Audi
BMW's sheer dominance was undeniable. 🏆🏁 Their cars consistently showed superior raw pace throughout the race. Engineering excellence indeed! #IMSA #BMW #RaceDominance #Motorsport

final_critique.feedback: Critique failed: RetryError[<Future at 0xffff903a2b90 state=finished raised ValueError>]
